participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and sociable, enjoys sharing stories and experiences from his life.
participant_1.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

participant_2.name: Zoe
participant_2.personality: Introverted and creative, highly focused on technology and innovation.
participant_2.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.

content.text: hi how are you doing today? i am good.
